 void setFramePosition(long framePos)
          Frame position is a 'long' not an 'int' because at 44100 frames per second, ints will overflow after about 12 hours, whereas longs are good for about 6 million years.
 void setSeeking(boolean seeking)
          If seeking is true, no sound is generated-- useful for starting in the middle of a script.

setFramePosition

public void setFramePosition(long framePos)
Frame position is a 'long' not an 'int' because at 44100 frames per second, ints will overflow after about 12 hours, whereas longs are good for about 6 million years.
